name: Kartik Biswas
text: The writing was sharp and witty. The movie was a true work of art.

name: Drishya Devan
text: The characters were so well-developed, I felt like I knew them personally. The movie was an absolute pleasure to watch.

name: Ivan Krishnamurthy
text: I left the theater with a renewed sense of hope. I couldn't stop thinking about it after it ended.

name: Madhup Mani
text: Such a heartwarming story, it brought tears to my eyes. I can't get the movie out of my head.

name: Dummy
text: It's a movie I'll be thinking about for a long time to come. I was left breathless by the sheer brilliance of it all.

name: Armaan Rajagopalan
text: The characters were so well-developed, I felt like I knew them personally. I've never seen anything quite like it before.

name: Dummy
text: I was left in awe of the sheer talent on display. The performances were some of the best I've ever seen.
